about.Content: I am driven by one of humanity's most distinctive traits - the desire to create. As a Maker by trade and by heart, I am always seeking new challenges and achievements. Whether it's writing code, creating art, or finding innovative uses for old technology, I relish the process of discovery and creation. I also have a passion for reverse engineering, as I find it fascinating to uncover the mysteries behind how things were made and the reasoning behind it, which I then use to inspire my own unique ideas.

projects.title: Katapult Labs
projects.subtitle: Terminal
projects.description: This project involved building a custom sign-in terminal for Katapult Lab's Libratorium (Maker Space), allowing members to sign in using an RFID card. The system logs the entry time and stores it in a central database for monitoring lab usage.
